name: Space Exile
description:
Space Exile is a combination of The Blockheads and Stationeers, resulting in 2D Minecraft on the Moon. You are a mad scientist who is exiled to the Moon for his crimes against humanity. You're tasked with surviving in a crater on the Moon.

Instructions
  • Mine using the red tool.
  • Drop items with X, pick items up with E.
  • Move inventory items by clicking on inventory slots.
  • Restart with F1, toggle UI with F2.
  • Use the garbage bench to acquire carbon material.
Footnote

Unfortunately the game isn't finished. I had insufficient time due to the large scope of the game. The primary gameplay loop (mining) is finished. However, the secondary gameplay loop (crafting and building) is not. My estimate is that it will take a further 100 hours to finish the game.

The ambient music was made by Marching Dream.

Total development time: 70 hours
